Html:
Hi, 

I would like to mess a little bit with the language parser, but i have the strong feeling that the scanner and parser are generated with another tool, not included in the distribution.

Is this true?
The scanner and parser are released under the Apache 2.0 license, so please feel free to check it out and make modifications.  Have you found the code to be difficult to adapt to your needs?

Hi,

I would like to define an custom binary operator...


On Fri, Oct 12, 2012 at 6:19 PM, jonturner <notifications@codeplex.com> wrote:

From: jonturner
